speaker_1.speaker: matthias
speaker_1.text: Captain... I've been thinking about what happened at the border. Those refugees...

speaker_2.speaker: matthias
speaker_2.text: I know we're mercenaries. We do what we're paid to do. But sometimes the job asks too much.

choice_1.text: A contract is a contract. Our reputation depends on completing the job.

choice_2.text: Some lines shouldn't be crossed, even for gold. I agree with you.

choice_3.text: Every choice has consequences. We live with ours.

speaker_3a.speaker: matthias
speaker_3a.text: *scowls* So that's who we are now? Just blades for hire, no matter who suffers?

speaker_3b.speaker: matthias
speaker_3b.text: *exhales* I'm glad to hear you say that, Captain. I was worried I'd signed on with the wrong company.

speaker_3c.speaker: matthias
speaker_3c.text: *nods slowly* That's a heavy truth. At least you're honest about it.

speaker_4a.speaker: matthias
speaker_4a.text: I'll follow orders, Captain. But don't expect me to like every one of them.

speaker_4b.speaker: matthias
speaker_4b.text: Maybe we can be more than just sellswords. Maybe we can make a real difference.

speaker_4c.speaker: matthias
speaker_4c.text: I appreciate a captain who speaks plainly. We'll see what the next job brings.
